description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Bread & Butter Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pudding,High protein,Seafood free,Low salt,Bread & butter pudding,Chocolate,Baking,Easter leftovers
name: Chocolate Bread & Butter Pudding Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 crusty knot bread rolls (or other leftover bread)

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a 5-cup oven proof dish. Slice rolls thickly and spread both sides with chocolate spread. Layer into dish.
Whisk eggs, sugar and milk together. Pour over bread and set aside for 20 minutes to allow bread to soak up liquid.
Place pudding on a tray and bake for 40 minutes, until golden and custard has set. Sprinkle with icing sugar if desired. Scoop onto serving plates and serve with ice cream.
